entries.arrived_at_loc: You have reach the optimum transmission point. Stand by for the interception of the signal to begin.
entries.attack_notify: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 < Enemy fighters detected. >pcontrast3 pcontrast1
entries.attack_stopped: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 < Enemy fighters eliminated. >pcontrast3 pcontrast1
entries.first_attack: Enemy fighters have detected your presence. Remain in the area until the transmission is completed but defend yourself against all attacking craft.
entries.found_loc: Optimum transmission interception point calculated. Move to this location to intercept signal.
entries.mission_complete: Transmission completed. Transmission appears to be orders from the Deep Corellia Mining Co. to agents posing as Massassi to drive the Yavin Mining Co. out of business. They are trying to take over the rich mining operations on Yavin 4.
entries.outofrange: Signal interupted. Return immediately to optimum transmission location in order to reestablish a link.
entries.outofrange_failed: The signal has stopped broadcasting. Transmission incomplete. Return to Yavin station.
entries.quest_defendpoint_d: The computer estimates that it will take about five minutes in order to get the entire broadcast. Remain in the area until it is completely intercepted.
entries.quest_location_d: The signal is being beamed into the Yavin system.
entries.quest_reachpoint_d: Your computer has determined the location of the strongest signal strength. Travel to that point and tap into the signal.
entries.title: Yavin System: Intercept the Massassi Transmission
entries.title_d: You have detected a signal coming from the Corellia system to this location. The signal is weak but you think you could tap into it.
entries.trans_update: FF0000 Flight Computer:FF0000 pcontrast3 < %DI percent of the transmission completed. > pcontrast3
entries.transmission_received: FF0000 Flight Computer:FF0000 pcontrast3 < Transmission completed. Decrypting now. > pcontrast3
entries.transmission_start: FF0000 Flight Computer:FF0000 pcontrast3 < Transmission link up established. Stand by for transmission updates. > pcontrast3
